name: RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel
description: The createDataChannel() method on the RTCPeerConnection interface creates a new channel linked with the remote peer, over which any kind of data may be transmitted.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
